4.「おお！ 聞こえているか！| どうやら術は 成功したようだな！: Oh, my God! Can you hear me! Looks like the|trick worked!

5.「おどろかせて すまない。| 今のは ボクと 巨人族であるキミが| 言葉を交わせ: I'm sorry for scaring you. That was just a|trick to allow me and you, a Titan, to|exchange words.

6.「ボクの名は シグルド！| 世界の均衡を守るべく戦う ヴァルハラの戦士！: My name is Sigurd! I am a warrior from|Valhalla, fighting to keep the world in|balance!

7.「キミの名は…… そうか <cs_pchero>か！| ボクの想像どおり 猛々し: Your name is... well... <cs_pchero>! Your|name is as fierce and beautiful as I imagined.

9.「ボクは それを食い止めるために 長い旅を| していたが その途中で 先ほどの巨: I was on a long journey to stop it, but along|the way I was caught by the giant bird I|mentioned earlier and trapped in this nest.

11.「まったく とんだ目にあったが| これも <cs_pchero>に 出会うための: I had a terrible time, but it may have been my|destiny to meet <cs_pchero>.

13.「……なんだって？| キミは 人に頼まれて 巨鳥に奪われた指輪を| 取り返しにき: What? You were sent by a man to get back the|ring that was stolen by a giant bird.

14.「それなら 優先すべきは その使命だな。| まずは その指輪を 持ち主に届けよう: Then our priority is the mission. First, we|must deliver the ring to its rightful owner!

15.「勇猛な巨人族 <cs_pchero>よ！| ボクの足では 移動するのに 時間が: Valiant Titan <cs_pchero>! It takes me a|long time to move on my own two feet. Let me|get into your bag.

17.かばんの中から シグルドの声が聞こえる。: I hear Sigurd's voice from inside his bag.

18.「どうやら これで| キミの使命は 済んだようだな！: Looks like you've done your job!

19.「それでは すまないが ボクの仲間が待つ| ヴァルハラの館へ 向かってくれ！: Then I'm sorry, but to Valhalla Hall, where my|companions await!

20.「じつは 幸運なことに ヴァルハラの館は| この 巨人族の町にあるんだ！: Actually, lucky for us, Valhalla's mansion is|in this Titan town!

21.「あの階段を上がれば 巨人族の住まう| 特別 大きな家がある。そこに入って| 右: Up those stairs is a special large house where|the Titans live. Enter there and go to the|room with the pink-colored door on your right!

22.「皆！ 遅くなって すまない！| ボクだ！ 今 帰ったぞ！！: Hey, guys! Sorry I'm late! It's me! I'm home!

23.「おおっ シグルド様！！| よくぞ…… ご無事で お帰りになりました！: Oh, Mr. Sigurd! I'm so glad you're back safe|and sound!

24.「おケガが ねえようで なによりです。| アッシらは 皆 シグルド様の お帰りを: I am glad to hear that you are not injured. We|have all been anxiously awaiting Sigurd's|return.

25.「ところで その巨人族は……？: By the way, are those Titans...?

26.「あの者の 視線をあびても| 身体が動く！ ということは…………: I can move my body even under his gaze! That|means...

27.「シグルド様！ ついに巨人族の戦士に| ふさわしき者を このヴァルハラの館へと|: Master Sigurd! At last you have brought a|worthy Titan Warrior to Valhalla Hall!

28.「<pc>。我々 ヴァルハラの戦士は| 先ほどの術の かかっていない 巨人族の|:
. We, the warriors of Valhalla,|are immobilized when we are exposed to the|gaze of the Titans who have not been subjected|
|to the same technique as before.

29.「これは 我々が 世の理に背いたゆえの制約。| ヴァルハラの戦士は もとは皆|:
This is a restriction because we have defied|the laws of the world. Every warrior in|Valhalla was once a warrior who died in|
|battle.

31.「さあ！ キミを このヴァルハラの館へ| 招いた理由を話そう。: Come on! Let me tell you why I invited you To|Valhalla Hall.

You Titans don't know that the world is ruled|by a great being called Odin the Mediator.|That the world is ruled by a great being|
|called Odin the Mediator.

34.<center>その オーディンの かたわらには|我らの主であり 世界の均衡を保: At Odin's side was our Lord, the Fate's War|Maiden, who has the power to maintain the|balance of the world.

35.<center>しかし…… 調停者オーディンは|突如 天命の戦乙女を いずこかへ: But... suddenly Odin the Mediator took the|Fate's War Maiden away and began to upset the|balance of the world.

36.<center>オーディンは……|この世界を 闇に葬ろうとしているのだ。: Odin...is trying to keep this world in the|dark.

37.「……我々は ヴァルハラの戦士だ！| 必ずや 我らが主 天命の戦乙女を奪還し|: We are the warriors of Valhalla! We will|surely take back our Lord, the Fate's War|Maiden, and restore balance to the world!

39.「天命の戦乙女の 行方を探すためには| 三賢人と呼ばれる方々の おチカラを| 借: In order to find the whereabouts of the Fate's|War Maiden, we must enlist the help of the|Three Wise Men.

40.「三賢人とは 英知の結晶……。世界の均衡を| より堅牢なものとする チカラを持つ:
The Three Wise Men are the fruits of wisdom|and have the power to bring about a more|robust balance in the world, but we do not|
|know their whereabouts.

42.「勇猛なる巨人族 <pc>よ！| このヴァルハラの館には 古来より| ある言い伝: Valiant Titan <pc>! In this house of|Valhalla, an ancient legend has been passed|down from generation to generation.

43.「世界の均衡が 崩れかけし時| 選ばれたる巨人族の戦士が 我らの道標となり| 世: When the balance of the world is about to be|shaken, a chosen Titan Warrior will be our|guide and save the world from darkness.

44.「ボクは あの巨鳥と戦うキミを見て 確信した！| 巨人族の戦士に ふさわしき者は: When I saw you fight that giant bird, I was|convinced! You are the only one worthy of|being a Titan Warrior!

45.「<pc>！ 我ら ヴァルハラの戦士の| 道標になってくれ！ 盟友の契りを結び|: <pc>! Be a beacon to the warriors of|Valhalla! Join us in the bonds of allyship,|become a Titan Warrior, and fight with us!<yesno><close>

46.「しかし このままでは 世界は| 闇に 葬り去られてしまう！| 頼む……キミのチ: But if we don't, the world will be left in|darkness! Please... we need you!

47.「ありがとう <pc>！| キミなら そう言ってくれると 信じていた！: Thank you <pc>! I knew you would say|that!

48.<if_woman>「皆 しかと見よ！| 彼女こそが 我らの道標となる| 巨人族: <if_woman>Behold! She is the Titan Warrior|<pc>, who will be our guide!<else>|Behold! He is the Titan Warrior|<pc>, who will be our guide!<endif>

49.「心強き 盟友を得た今| 我らの勝利は 約束されたも同然だ！: Now that we have a strong ally, our victory is|as good as assured!
